ool.tech"]],"hashrate_block_all":168383886718.75,"hashrate_block_min":2857174393.9619274,"hashrate_block_max":4912045565.518466,"pool_hashblock_average":3884609979.7401967,"hashrate_block":168383886718.75},"time":1748658366,"hashrate":2725.3704812365,"difficulty":817611.14437095,"height":979286,"symbol":"DCR","maxhash":9700000000000,"poolshash":14910000000000,"nethash_estimat":16838388671875,"poolsminers":0,"supply":{"circulating":16823644.40661226,"total":16823516.16527646,"emission24":1867},"block_time_target":300,"block_height_ok":true,"algo":"Blake3","hashrate_from_diff":false,"hashrate_src":"difficulty\/block_time
